provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the District Constables (Rates
of Pay) Regulations, 1944.

provisions.title: Section 2
Section 3
provisions.content:
3. Subject to the provisions of regulation 4 every district constable
shall receive one dollar sixty cents in respect of-
     (a) any day upon which he performs any duty or duties;
     (b). any night in which he performs any duty or duties.

provisions.title: Section 4
provisions.content:
4. Where any district constable performs any duty or duties in any
day and also performs any duty or duties in any night immediately pre-
ceding or succeeding such day, he shall receive two dollars in respect
of the duties performed in such day and night.
